price: (Soro aheman no mu) anigyesεm no na εyε, anaasε Zaquum dua noa?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
